Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Really nice vib. I arrived late during the new Covid lock down so wasn't sure if I could be accommodated.  Sat upstairs and was well looked after by a really nice staff mamber even though my colleagues couldn't make it in time. Will definitely visit again.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: We came here all the way from Chicago, IL, USA!! They threw down on the vegan pad Thai and the massaman was üòòüëå authentic and comforting on a cool chilly night. Very nice staff and service üòå Well worth the trip!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Food is really nice and tasty. Prices are reasonable too but we spent three hours at the restaurant...most of the time was spent waiting for the food. I can see reviews complaining about slow service from 3 YEARS AGO...maybe just employ ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
Best Pad Thai in town.
Pleasant vibes with a really cool and friendly staff.
Love coming here.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: When we came in, the bartenders and waiter saw us, but no one say ‚Äúhi‚Äù. They were just continuing their group chatting until a waitress finally host us. We were surprised the bar also serve Thai food, so we ordered some starters and main ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Wonderful staff and chefs! Made the food Thai spicy just the way I wanted it. The taste was like I was back in Thailand again. Thank you!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
TLDR: yummy Thai food but very unprofessional staff.

It took quite some time before someone came to get our order although it wasn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
I absolutely love their food, super tasty Thai, probably the best I have had in Amsterdam.
Highly recommended

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: It‚Äôs more a bar than restaurant. You have to order a drink regardless, some rule of theirs. Food was served super quick and was nice. Busy atmosphere.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great food, nice location, an excellent service..Bas was taking good care of us. Highly recommend!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
Best Thai food in Amsterdam love it
Love the vibe and the music ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Fantastic Thai food and prices are really good

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great place to hangout and some good food to boot. I had good friendly service. A little slow, but it was packed, so understood.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Exceed my expectations. Great food and nice presentation. More of a restaurant feel than a bar feel.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: amazing food, friendly stuff

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: I can‚Äôt really say anything about the food yet. But what a great spot to hang out in the shade! Really friendly personnel and cool interior. The coffee is really good. They serve Rovers coffee, loved it! Been chilling here almost all day and will definitely come back to try their Thai specialties.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Delicious food (I always get Pad Thai) and lovely hosts with original Thai cooks. An super extra plus is the coffee, it's hard to find a good coffee in a restaurant these days.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Would not expect this place to serve delicious Thai food based on its exterior, but my word is it good.  Great selection of dishes with a nice cocktail menu as well.  Some of the dishes pack a nice punch, too - always a rarity in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great gin and tonic and even better Phad Thai

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great place, laid back, perfect to just grab a drink, have amazing Thai food, or both! The staff is friendly, nice sitting outside. Gets busy so book a table if you want to ensure a table!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Best pad thai eveeeer ü§§

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: One of my friend lives near Golden Brown Bar, so we decide to get takeout. They don't have this place available on Uber Eats or delivery, so you have to pick up... worth it. I have tried a ton of different Thai food restaurants and this ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. Great food, great gin and tonic, lovely setting.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great place for a late afternoon wheat beer outside in the sun. Excellent Thai food but as it got colder later on in the evening we wanted to move inside but they weren't keen on letting us, even though there were empty tables upstairs. Spoiled the end a little.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Love this place for both lunch and dinner. Good thai for a very reasonable price. Unpretentious and friendly service and staff, even when it is very busy. I live in the neighborhood and come here for just a drink or a dinner often. Keep up the good work. Hard to find such a place in Amsterdam :)!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great place, very friendly people and hands down awesome food, big portions!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great food but we were refused tap water with our meals. Bizarre considering we spent a lot on food, but we didn‚Äôt order any drinks. Have never experienced this at a restaurant before, very strange.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Ordered chicken satay and it came fried, not grilled. Not authentic at all. And the peanut sauce was too salty. The waitress was initially friendly but when we declined to order drinks with our food, she immediately turned cold and frosty. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere with friendly and efficient staff. We saw the Thai food on offer on our first visit and decided to return to eat and we were not disappointed. No hesitation in recommending this bar.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: This bar was very lively, staff were so polite and caring. The food and beverages had high quality ingredients. We enjoyed our time there.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Food is tasteful Thai+. The same you can score at a take away, but presented om a nice platter in a nice atmosphere. Just be prepared to wait for a loooooong time i.e. approximately 1.5 hours. Happened to me three times already.  But staff is nice and friendly and food nice.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: After johnny at the spot(the pioneer of the new OUD West) this was the first lounge/restaurant to be opened here! The cooks are real Thai and the food is just a gift from heaven! ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: From the outside a nice bar, however the staff was super grumpy and helped us after like 30 minutes after arrival for drinks only (next to the bar), and it was not that crowded. So we left quickly to another bar on the other side of the ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
Not sure what is the love is all about I thought this place is just okay.
We had lunch here another day and ordered green and yellow curry, spring rolls, side rice and side of veggies. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: I echo what most people have said about this place. The service...Slow, arrogant, almost hateful looking staff. Food, best Thai Ive had in Amsterdam and good value. If you've travelled to Thailand and want an experience like the marvellous ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: A lot has changed since I last came here. The service has gotten worse. With only 4 people in the place they still managed to forget the food I ordered. It was until I saw those after get their full dish (I got a snack) I had to walk to the ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: I visited the Golden Brown Bar on my first evening in Amsterdam. Was terribly tired and sleep deprived after a long flight and a canal boat ride. Somehow it did not occur to me to check on the closing time for restaurants because everything ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
This is a cozy, lovely  restaurant with  nice atmosphere inside.
The waiter was friendly. We had ordered asian dishes and they tasted great.
It was reasonably priced.
All with all: great value for money!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Love this place! Amsterdam is a warm, friendly city and this neighbourhood Thai restaurant fits the bill. Food was extremely fresh, staff was very helpful and we didn't have to wait long to find a table.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Love this place! Nice staff, lekker tha√Ø food, delicious cocktails, reasonable prices. We always come back!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: No complaints about the service. Food was DELICIOUS. The chicken satay was extremely well flavoured with a nice crunch, and the curry with rice had great flavours. Coffee also came with a stroopwaffle. Solid restaurant.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Do not order mixed drinks. A total rip off. My mojito had do much ice, I took 3 sips and it was done. The bartender proceeded to argue with us that that's how mojitos are done and that we were wrong. I had my share of mixed drinks ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: I have been going here for about a year and never had any complaints , the food is good and the people are nice , but I went there the other night with my sister who was visiting me from the UK and towards the end of the meal she found a ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Everything was incredibly tasty from the food to the cocktails. Have the Lap Kai and papaya salad. Get the Bobby's Blend, with a splash of ginger ale. I'm not usually one for Thai, as it's hard to manage my peanut allergy, but these people are absolute pros!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Foods lovely, but charging 12-15 Euro (depending on protein choice) + rice on top ~2.5 Euro is pretty stiff.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: The food was good. Service was terrible! The waitress completely ignored my wife and was rude to us the entire time. She stared at me to the point of making me feel uncomfortable and blocking the space between my partner and I. The staff could use lots of improvement.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: The best Thai food I have tried in Amsterdam. And I have tried a lot. Fresh ingredients. Each dish has their dedicated taste. Great service.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text:
After a hectic weekend in Amsterdam, we stumbled upon this bar late on Sunday evening.
Not only were the Barmen cheerful and welcoming The Thai food that is served here is the most authentic We have tasted outside of Thailand!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Thai food was decent but -1 star for the food not being entirely authentic (ordered massaman and there were no potatoes in it) and -1 star for horribly long waiting times (we waited for an hour for our food to arrive).

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Food is good but service is too long. We waited 1h30 hour before being served even having made a prior reservation online

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great thai food place in a bar like setup. Fun ambience. Nice place to hangout with friends and enjoy some food. They've outdoor seating too.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Nice area. Didn't stay that long or try the food, but enjoyed sitting on the benches in the street sipping a beer. Good service, the friendly barwoman gave me some information about getting the tram.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: The food was fine but the service was terrible. The waiter who served us brought us our dishes without making eye contact, he was openly unfriendly and behaved in an arrogant way when we tried to express politely that we were not feeling comfortable. He made us feel like we shouldn't be there... A very unpleasant experience!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Sandwiches didn‚Äôt look great but tasted very good - red curry and pad Thai were probably the winners I would probably advise to stick to Thai menu

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: My soy latte was delicious and I like fact that the tealight was kept lit. A bit loud in the evening. Very nice interior.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Very cool place with good vibes. Amazing Thai food and not expensive at all. The staff were very friendly. It's a place to come back..!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Such incredible thai food. The service was a bit rude in my experience but I imagine that‚Äôs not a regular situation. Definitely worth the visit

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Flavors were amazing, not sure if authentic but that wasn't a concern. Service was friendly and prompt. Would recommend for a quick lunch before exploring Amsterdam!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: A nice place to enjoy good Thai food and drinks. Nice staff and a cosy place to sit. The terras is nice in the summer. Highly recommend it!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Visit the Golden Brown if you're looking for a nice, relaxed atmosphere where you can have a drink and talk to your friends. It's. It never too crowded and if you get in early, grab a bite to eat! At the same time, it's nothing special, just s place you can eat and drink.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Unfortunately had a poor experience. Walked in on New Year's Eve and the bar lady was rude and unwelcoming, short with us when taking our order. It was a disappointing experience after having received recommendations from friends.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: One of the most authentic thai food that I can find in Europe. The thai green curry is a must try if you miss the savoury taste.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Tasty Thai food in a nice setting. You wouldn't think they serve Thai food given the exterior/interior, but a quality joint all around

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: This place is really great. Their drinks are excellent, must get the Thai mojito! Food and service are excellent as well!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: They have a good collection of cocktails and the decor is quite good. Food-wise it is a decent thai place, but not the best in town.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Amazing gin tonics! Try the Bobby's Blend with orange and clove. Pairs wonderfully with the slightly spicy Thai food.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great food, friendly service and nice mixed drinks (variations of GT)!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great tasting Thai food, really quick and friendly service, best value for money - the pad thai plate was huge!

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Noisy place & bad prepared food. I guess they dont have a real cook. My laat experience took me urgently to toilet in 5 minutes.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Fabulous authentic Thai food in a great setting with good beers. I tried the green curry and it was delicious.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Love the place ! Great sofa, great beer, amazing pad tha√Ø !! People are nice, i just don't see why you could not love it there

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Service was good, food was tasty. Regular Thai experience in a lovely setting.

Name: Golden Brown Bar
Review Text: Great spot, great Thai food, great people!
